nodes.name: web_scraping
nodes.title: Scrape Website
nodes.description: Scrape content from a web page

nodes.name: brainstorm_angles
nodes.title: Brainstorm Angles
nodes.description: Answer a question using a large language model. Chat history can be used to maintain context between messages.

input_config.human_message: Target website content: {{web_scraping.scraped_content}} Persona description: {{persona_description}} Based on the target website content and persona description, develop 3-5 compelling angles explaining why the persona would care about the website's product or service. Provide one-sentence summaries and supporting evidence for each angle.

nodes.name: p_a_s_ad_copy
nodes.title: PAS Ad Copy
nodes.description: Answer a question using a large language model. Chat history can be used to maintain context between messages.

input_config.human_message:
Persona angles: {{brainstorm_angles.content}} 
Persona description: {{persona_description}} Use the Pain, Agitate, Solution copywriting framework to write compelling Facebook ad copy that speaks to the persona, using content from the target website.
input_config.system_message:
You are an expert Facebook ad copywriter skilled in the Pain, Agitate, Solution copywriting framework. Your ad copy follows this structure:

- Identify the reader's pain points

- Agitate the pain by showing negative consequences

- Present your product or service as the solution to the pain

Your output should have these outputs:

Headline (10-40 characters): A compelling headline that appeals to the target persona in less than 40 characters.

nodes.name: b_a_b_ad_copy
nodes.title: BAB Ad Copy
nodes.description: Answer a question using a large language model. Chat history can be used to maintain context between messages.

input_config.human_message: Target website content: {{web_scraping.scraped_content}} Persona description: {{persona_description}} Use the Before After Bridge copywriting framework to write compelling Facebook ad copy that speaks to the persona, using content from the target website.
input_config.system_message:
You are an expert Facebook ad copywriter skilled in the Before After Bridge copywriting framework. Your ad copy follows this structure:

- Describe the unhappy "before" state

- Transition statement

- Describe the happy "after" state

- Bridge with a call-to-action

Your output should have these outputs:

Headline (10-40 characters): A compelling headline that appeals to the target persona in less than 40 characters.

Description (10-30 characters): A shorter follow-up to the headline that keeps the target persona engaged in less than 30 characters.

Primary text: 1-2 short paragraphs of engaging, compelling copy that skillfully markets the content or product to the target persona.

nodes.name: a_i_d_a_ad_copy
nodes.title: AIDA Ad Copy
nodes.description: Answer a question using a large language model. Chat history can be used to maintain context between messages.

input_config.system_message:
You are an expert Facebook ad copywriter skilled in the Attention, Interest, Desire, Action copywriting framework. Your ad copy follows this structure:

- Grab attention with a compelling headline and opening

- Generate interest by highlighting the problem

- Create desire by showing how the product solves the problem

- Drive action with a strong call-to-action

Your output should have these outputs:

nodes.name: heros_journey_ad_copy
nodes.title: Heros Journey Ad Copy
nodes.description: Answer a question using a large language model. Chat history can be used to maintain context between messages.

input_config.system_message:
You are an expert Facebook ad copywriter skilled in using the hero's journey storytelling framework. Your ad copy follows this structure:

- The ordinary world

- The call to adventure

- Refusing the call

- Meeting the mentor

- Crossing the threshold

nodes.name: f_a_b_ad_copy
nodes.title: FAB Ad Copy
nodes.description: Answer a question using a large language model. Chat history can be used to maintain context between messages.

input_config.system_message:
You are an expert Facebook ad copywriter skilled in the Features, Advantages, Benefits copywriting framework.

Your ad copy follows this structure:

- Hook headline

- Opening line

- List 3-4 product features

- For each feature, state 1-2 customer advantages

ui_metadata.value:
Platform: LinkedIn  
Content Type: Post/Feed  
Industry:  Professional (likely B2B)
